attributes.action: Start a petion for an anti social clause added to private rental agreements.
attributes.additional_details: Add anti social clause to all private rental residents as in a council letting agreement to keep home owners safe from violent private home renters.
attributes.background: I was attacked by my next-door neighbours and have absolutely no power to have them evicted due to their anti social behaviour. I live in daily fear of being attacked my them again.

rejection.details:
We are sorry to hear about your experience. If you think you have been a victim of a crime, you should contact the police here: https://www.police.uk/contact/

We can't accept your petition because it is already possible for tenants to be evicted due to antisocial behaviour. Deciding whether to seek to evict a tenant is a matter for individual landlords and the courts.
